snippet: Three South Korean workers died Friday after apparently inhaling toxic gas at a construction site for a nuclear plant being built by South Korea’s monopoly nuclear power company, which has come under recent threats by hackers, a company official...

headline.print_headline: South Korea: 3 Die at Nuclear Plant’s Construction Site
headline.main: South Korea: 3 Die at Nuclear Plant’s Construction Site

lead_paragraph: Three South Korean workers died Friday after apparently inhaling toxic gas at a construction site for a nuclear plant being built by South Korea’s monopoly nuclear power company, which has come under recent threats by hackers, a company official said.
